componentDescription: Displays a user's avatar, which can be an image or initials, with customizable size and styles.

src.description: Source URL for the avatar image.

size.description: Optional size of the avatar, predefined in 'Size' type.

fallback.description: URL or path for the fallback image if the source fails to load.

views.description: Optional custom styles for the avatar, defined by 'AvatarStyles'.
